35964.「自分の運命を 呪ってはいけないよ。\n こんな時代でも 希望は必ず あるはずだ:
Don't curse your own fate. Even in times like
these, there must be hope. There always is.

35965.「私どもは フォステイル様と\n 命がけで海を渡って\n このオーグリード大陸へ:
We risked our lives crossing the ocean with Mr. Fostail to come to Ogreed Continent. All in order to fulfill a certain purpose. It is a
coincidence that we found you in a place like this. Why don't you take a rest for a while?

35966.「この海峡の岩屋の 南西にある\n ランドンフットへ向かい ランドンクイナを\n:
Head to Landonfoot, southwest of Grotto Strait, and join forces with Erju to defeat Apeckalypse. And bring back the Icebird
Feathers that Apeckalypse sometimes drops to us. Sorry, but I'm counting on you.

35967.「ああ おかえり。\n どうやら 氷鳥のはねを 手に入れたようだね。:
Ah, welcome back. It looks like you received
Icebird Feather.

35968.<attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>「おや？ すまな: <attr><feel_think_lv1><end_attr>Oh? I'm sorry. I must have been mistaken.

35969.フォステイルに\n氷鳥のはねを 渡しますか？<yesno><close>: Would you give Icebird Feather to Fostail?<yesno><close>

35970.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「ありがとう <:
Thanks . I really appreciate you being here. Erju also seems to be grateful to you. Please continue to support him so that he
can inherit the art of the Sacred Ship. Gamilgo, the last of the Four Sorcerers, is supposed to be living in the Wild Settlement
northwest of Landonfoot. But he will not open his heart to Erju, the human. You take care.

35971.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「我らの求めてい:
We heard that you got the Icebird Feather that we have been looking for! Oh, if only we had this, Parka Russ Kingdom! Thank you, human! If
you don't mind, please take a good night's rest in this rockery.

35972.「ガミルゴが 人間相手に\n 戦争をしかけようとしていたとは……。\n 事態は思:
I didn't realize that Gamilgo was trying to start a war against the human race. Things are more serious than I thought. .
Now is not the time for a war between the people of this land. I hope Erju can convince Theodore. I hope Erju can convince Theodore.

35973.「……なに？ 継承の儀を終わらせずに\n レイダメテスに 乗り込むだって？\n<:
What? You want to board the Reidametes without completing the Inheritance Ritual? It is true that Erju's Sacred Ship may be able to reach
Reidametes from the summit in the Landon Mountains. We only have a short time left. It's a risky bet, but I have faith in Erju.

35974.「確かに ランドン山脈の山頂からなら\n エルジュの破邪舟でも レイダメテスに\:
Indeed, from the summit in the Landon Mountains, Erju's Sacred Ship may be able to reach Reidametes. Time is running out. It's a
risky gamble, but I have faith in Erju.

35975.「ありがとう <pc>。\n キミの活躍により 私たちは\n レイダメテスの危機:
Thank you . It seems that we have escaped the crisis of Reidametes because of YOU. I will return to the Kingdom of Parkaras.
And I will leave a poem about you to tell the story. For decades, for centuries, for generations to come. I wonder why
. I feel a strange fate with you. I have a feeling that we will meet again somewhere.

35976.<attr><feel_sad_lv3><end_attr>「ううっ…… 長い旅:
It has been a long journey. At last you can return to the Kingdom of Parkeras! I'm sure the people of the homeland are eagerly
awaiting your return. We must get ready to go home as soon as possible! But first, let us entertain our benefactor who
brought us the feather of the ice bird. Well, well, well...

38893.ランドンクイナは\n氷鳥のはねを 落としていった。\n<auto_br=5000:
Apeckalypse dropped Icebird Feather.
<auto_br=5000>
<pc> received Icebird Feather (Key
Item)!<se_nots System Item>
